title: Senior HRBP Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: Easily communicated easy during the interview and left you feeling very excited. The interviewer was very professional, full of information about the company and the roll, and left me with no questions as we entered the interview.
Interview Questions: What are you seeking in this position?

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is an initial screening interview with the recruiter via phone. Followed by an in person interview with the hiring manager on site. A day later offer was made.
Interview Questions: Why are you looking to leave your current job?

title: Hospice RN Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: I had an person interview with future direct supervisor and her superior. They asked some scenario questions regarding how you've handle difficult situations in the past on the job. Also asked more detail about your bedside as well as leadership experience.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had a difficult situation with a patient's family and how did you handle it.

title: Care Navigator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Empath Health (Tampa, FL) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very quick and efficient, talked about important issues and topics. Enjoyed the phone call very much. And the interviewee was great and great to talk to the entire phone conversation.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose this job?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: normal interview process meet with Manager talk about the position, normal questions asked.  It was a positive interview. Do not have 30 words to write about this interview. word, word, word, word, word,
Interview Questions: do not remember

title: RN Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Empath Health (Palm Harbor, FL) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: They wanted an interview right away. I interviewed with two managers. It was a relaxed environment. Typical interview questions.  They asked several. Did not ask for references. Told me a recruiter would be in contact. The recruiter called me a few hours later to say I was a final candidate.
Interview Questions: What is the definition of integrity?

title: Lpn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: I had one phone interview and then was called for the real one.  Very slow to schedule an interview.  It took 6wks for me to be contacted.  It was a two person interview where they both asked different questions
Interview Questions: If I had a flexible schedule

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Largo, FL) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very casual.  The hiring process was very difficult.  The screening involved a computer literacy/typing component, drug screen, level 2 background check involving fingerprinting and photo,  proof of vaccinations or IGG tigers, 2 TB screens, 10 years of employment history, physical exam, and all at the applicant's expense of approximately $200.00.
Interview Questions: How many years of experience as a Pharmacy Technician to you have?

title: Community Partnership Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Clearwater, FL) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: I received a phone call to schedule an in person interview within two weeks of applying. The staffing consultant and Director of Community Outreach asked me about five questions each. The staffing consultant focused on work behavior/situational questions. The Director asked questions about the specific position and company.
Interview Questions: Describe your organizational process.

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Clearwater, FL)
Interview Descriptions: It took several calls to get an interview HR had no idea what they were doing.  Finally one of the managers called me back after one of my nurse friends gave her my name and number and told her that I was trying to get an interview.
Interview Questions: They passed me on to the head of the department that I was applying to and she and I had a great conversation as to the job I would be doing she is quite knowledgeable of the job.

title: ARNP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Clearwater, FL) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Awesome interview and very thorough I got to meet the medical director and he was very down to earth and honest. They answered all my questions and the HR person took time out of her day to answer all my tedious questions -I felt very supported and they were very transparent with the company and let me speak to the other ARNP's in the company which I thought was awesome
Interview Questions: How I dealt with difficult patients?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Empath Health (Largo, FL) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions:
Because the position is contracted, I found the job ad on Craigslist because the staffing agent posted one there. I am very fortunate in that my staffing agent is awesome and very helpful as I have certainly heard horror stories, but thankfully I do not have one myself. She really helped the process move quickly (especially quickly for something in the healthcare industry).

First, there was a phone interview with who would be (and currently is) my manager. A standard phone interview, thankfully my manager is a dog lover because my dog was causing quite a ruckus while I was on the phone. All questions that were asked were fair and to be expected, given the position.

Second came an in-person interview with my manager and the director of the affiliate. We sat at a small round table in the director's office - a very comfortable atmosphere as it didn't feel extremely judgmental or like there was some strict hierarchical dynamics at play. Big fan of this style of interview and should I ever be in a position to interview others, I will do it like this.

Afterwards, I was shown around the office in which I'd be working if I got an offer. Very comfortable, laid back, conversational interview at this point. Spent about a total of 2 hours at the campus.

I was drug tested even though it was not a clinical position. The test results were clear but the processing of the test took several days, leading me to start on a Tuesday instead of a Monday, and thus lengthening the overall process.
Interview Questions: What is a situation in which you had to handle a disgruntled or angry customer?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Empath Health (Clearwater, FL) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: I went to a company hiring event and met with the nursing supervisor and was offered a job on the spot.  Prior to the hiring event I completed an online application.
Interview Questions: It was very basic...."tell me about yourself" kind of questions.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Saint Petersburg, FL)
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process is slow.  The interview was with a panel of
Interview Questions: No unexpected questions it was a straightforward interview.

title: Flex RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: after  applying,expect a long wait before receiving a call for an interview.
Interview Questions: What positive benefits can you bring to this company?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Palm Harbor, FL) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: Mix of job knowledge and behavioral questions. Interviewed by two members of the team. Had a chance to ask questions. Was prepared for stressful nature of position. Behavioral questions were more difficult than imagined. People with Hospice history or home health care history will probably fare better.
Interview Questions: What was a time you had a conflict with a co-worker and how did you handle it.

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Empath Health
Interview Descriptions: Took 2 months.  Interview not memorable
Interview Questions: N/A

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Empath Health (Jacksonville, FL) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: pretty basics questions, and then asked a few questions about myself. very relaxed enviroment I felt at ease the whole interview. was given a tour of facility at time of interview and everyone I met was very nice and seemed sincere about what they were there to do
Interview Questions: what can you bring to this company

title: Eligibility Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health (Saint Petersburg, FL) in Jan 2012
Interview Descriptions: It was informal and friendly.  The interviewers were most interested in what I could bring to the mission of the company.  They truly sought my counsel as to what could make the organization better and the way in which clients are served.  I left the interview feeling valued whether I was to be offered the position or not.
Interview Questions: What do you already know about us as an organization?

title: Nursing/Hospice Aid/Field Staff Mentor Hospice Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Empath Health (Clearwater, FL) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: There were a total of 8 interviewers around the table. They each asked a few questions about why I would be good for the job, as well as my background. They also explained that much of the job would be done from the office setting. This was disappointing to me, as I would rather have helped develop staff in the field
Interview Questions: Have you been in a mentoring position before?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Empath Health in Mar 2010
Interview Descriptions: very long boring orientation
Interview Questions: what are your strengths
